page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [RBX2d][Managed vSphere] - Cluster10057 incident notification
incidents.message: We would like to inform you that we had an incident on the specific Cluster10057 in RBX2d. This incident has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 19/10/2025 09:15 UTC End time : 19/10/2025 09:43UTC Impacted Service(s) : Cluster10057 was temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access their data on the specified cluster. Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.
